hero.title_en: Maritime Networks of the Indian Ocean
hero.subtitle_hi: प्राचीन समुद्री व्यापार—बुजंग घाटी, नागपट्टिनम व्यापारी संघ और 'Ocean of Churn' के परिप्रेक्ष्यों से।
hero.subtitle_en: Explore ancient maritime exchange through three lenses: the Bujang Valley network, Nagapattinam merchant guilds, and the 'Ocean of Churn'.
hero.aria_label: Ocean Networks — Indian Ocean maritime exchange

seo.meta_en: A bilingual, evidence-first view of Indian Ocean maritime networks with schematic maps and curated sources.

footnotes: Map is schematic; coordinates are approximate centroids.
Items marked 'Needs citation' will be updated as sources are verified in Reading Room.
